spatial_accuracy.notes: General wall alignment and room layout are mostly accurate. Several doors have been omitted, specifically the main entrance door and the internal doors connecting the hall to the laundry and bathroom areas. Window placement on the right elevation matches the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing several door components (E1). The wall thickness is consistent, but the removal of the entrance door creates a structural void that deviates from the architectural plan. All rooms are present, but adjacency is slightly broken by missing portals.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent furniture mapping. The U-shaped kitchen layout, laundry appliances, and bathroom fixtures (curved tub) are accurately positioned and scaled.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering. Clean geometry, soft shadows, and clear diffuse lighting. The top-down orthographic perspective is well-executed.

detected_errors.description: Missing main entrance door and internal doors for laundry and bathroom suites.
The orientation of the small closet door near the entrance is missing its swing representation.
The kitchen counter lacks the specific sink and stove placement details shown in the 2D symbology.
